arStrings.szText: When you {c_important}Evade{/c} you turn into a cloud of bats, becoming {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|1|]{/c} seconds. Enemies along your path take {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus)  * 2]{/c} Physical damage and are inflicted with {c_important}{u}Vampiric Curse.{/u}{/c}  {c_important}Evade's{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.

When you {c_important}Evade{/c} you gain {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c}, turn into bats, and deal {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * 2]{/c} Physical damage.
